Wouldn't it be great if managing diabetes was easier? With the Dario Blood Glucose Monitoring System, it is. Say goodbye to bulky meters, finger-prick devices and annoying diabetic logbooks. Dario’s innovative meter puts everything at your fingertips by connecting directly to your iPhone. Plug in the Dario meter, apply one drop of blood to the test strip, and get your results to your online logbook in 6 seconds. 
 
SMART & SMALL
 The all-in-one Dario Blood Glucose Monitoring System combines the meter, lancet and test strips in a unit so small it can fit in your pocket. This makes it easy to keep with you, whether at home or on-the-go. With Dario, checking your blood glucose is quick, easy and discreet, one drop at a time. 
 
NEW! BLOOD PRESSURE MONITOR
Dario is more than just a diabetes tracker. As many people with diabetes also have hypertension, including up to 80% of people with type 2 diabetes, Dario also pairs with another health device: the Dario Blood Pressure Monitoring System. Record and store blood pressure measurements in the same logbook where you record sugar levels for a more complete perspective of your health. Monitor these two medical conditions together for better condition control and share with your doctor. Develop healthier habits and to live better every day with Dario.
 
THE DARIO DIFFERENCE
Dario makes it easy to see your medical trends and build better health habits according to your results. With insights gained through the Dario app, you may learn which foods and activities lead to better results. You can see how following a treatment plan improves your blood pressure results. Getting this positive reinforcement in real time is a powerful motivator! One drop is all it takes to see where you stand with this innovative diabetes tracker.
 
SIMPLE SHARING
Keep your healthcare providers and family members up to date on your diabetes measurements. One click and you can share all the health data and logbooks in the Dario app with anyone you like. 
 
COUNT CARBS & TRACK ACTIVITY
Keeping count of carbohydrate intake can be a challenge, but Dario does the math for you! Simply tag which foods you ate, and Dario will automatically calculate your carbs. With time, you may even start spotting patterns between the foods you’ve eaten and your sugar results and learn how to choose foods that your body responds to better. The same goes for activity. With Dario, you can keep a record of your daily exercise (even washing the dishes!) and see if your habits influence your glucose levels. And Dario integrates with the Apple HeatlhKit, so your exercise, nutrition, and health data is recorded in one easy to access location. The results of this diabetes tracker may surprise you!
 
DARIO ACCURACY
Dario has been tested extensively to ensure it meets FDA guidance for accuracy, that 95% of measurements are within ±15% of a true lab-tested value. This means you can be assured that the Dario meter will provide results you can trust. Dario has also presented numerous scientific studies to the ADA, demonstrating how its system helps improve life for people with diabetes.
 
HYPO ALERT SYSTEM WITH GPS LOCATOR
Dario can be a lifesaver because when a hypo strikes, time is of the essence! Dario's hypo alert system with GPS location can help bring you peace of mind. Simply connect the Dario meter to your smartphone, and upon recording a dangerously low glucose reading, the Dario app will send a prepared text message with the current blood sugar reading and GPS location, to up to 4 emergency contacts.

The information provided is not intended to be used for medical diagnosis or treatment or as a substitute for professional medical advice. Please consult your physician or qualified health provider regarding your condition and appropriate medical treatment. Individual symptoms, situations and circumstances may vary.

Sugarmate is a companion app for users of the Dexcom G4/G5/G6 continuous glucose monitoring system. It works great for both the CGM wearer or follower.

Why use Sugarmate with your CGM?

Peace of Mind
- Automatically text message family and friends (with GPS coordinates) when glucose levels get urgently low (Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life)
- Receive a phone call when glucose levels go below normal while you're sleeping (even when your phone is in Do Not Disturb mode)
- Steady Above Normal, Predictive High, and Predictive Low notifications with customizable alert sounds

Motivation
- Over 30 customizable tiles, including a mini-graph and other stats such as time in range, GMI (& est. A1c), bedtime/wake averages, unicorn counts, % in range/low/high, total insulin, total carbs, and many more
- Daily stats
- Generate and email spreadsheet reports with graphs, stats and all readings, activity and notes

Readings Everywhere
- Display readings continuously on your watch, or even in your car (using Sugarmate's calendar functionality)
- Real-time syncing across all of your devices, including the Sugarmate Mac and web apps
- Today Widget with real time stats and graphs for your lockscreen
- Siri Shortcuts: just say "what's my sugar", "add insulin", "lookup food" and more

Advanced Tracking
- Built-in nutritional food lookup, with voice recognition, food imagery, and barcode scanning
- An infinitely scrolling history of all of your sugar levels and activity. Pinch to zoom, or rotate your phone to enlarge
- Apple Health: two-way syncing, plus automatically creates walk/jog/run events based on your steps
- Offline saving so you can still log while out of service

And more
- Easy setup: follow the instructions to add Sugarmate as a Follower (using only one Follow slot for everyone)
- Themes: make the app more personal by picking your own color scheme
- Multi-user support: manage 2+ people's sugar levels on one phone or Apple Watch

The data displayed in this app is for informational purposes and should not be used to make medical decisions of any kind. Please see our Terms of Use on our website for more details.

The Sugarmate Platform is not intended to modify data received from the continuous glucose monitor system. Nor is it intended to instruct, or to transmit information to the continuous glucose monitor system.

The Sugarmate Platform is not intended to serve as a replacement for a primary display device for a continuous glucose monitoring system.

Dosing decisions should not be made based on this device. The user should follow instructions on the continuous glucose monitoring system. This device is not intended to replace self-monitoring practices as advised by a physician.

This application is not owned by or affiliated with Dexcom.

This application is not owned by or affiliated with the Nightscout Project.

Your blood sugar levels, blood pressure, and body weight give a bigger picture of your health. Let’s read about each component in brief.

Blood Glucose Level: The amount of glucose present in your blood is your blood glucose level. Diabetes and high blood sugar level are becoming oversized issues nowadays. Over time, they can harm your body and lead to many unknown problems.

Blood Pressure: Your heart circulates blood in the body to supply it with appropriate oxygen and energy. This circulation of your blood pushes towards the side of the blood vessels. The pressure at which this process takes place is your blood pressure. High blood pressure results in extra stress on the arteries and heart, which can cause heart problems.

Body Weight: Today’s irregular lifestyle is leading to obesity in most people. Being overweight means excess fat, which can also lead to many diseases.

What are you waiting for? Analyze your health today with the help of our blood glucose tracker application and take your treatment to the next level.
